Job Description: We are looking for engineers who are driven to solve challenges of large-scale system design, artificial intelligence, information retrieval, massive data pipelines, UI design, rich media frameworks, data insights, optimization and targeting strategies.    The mission of the Data Engineering team is to empower the customers and business stakeholders to derive audience, contextual, psychographic, targeting and optimization insights across the digital platforms.    This is done by collecting and processing data from multiple sources across our ad tech platform and producing advanced insights and optimization recommendations   Responsibilities:   The position requires one to work on complex technical projects with peers in an innovative and fast-paced environment.   Play an individual contributor role with high accountability, positive impact in small teams and work well both as an individual and as part of the team   Work on algorithms and systems that power the contextual segment engine using text mining, information retrieval and machine learning.   Work on massive semi-structured text, time series and graph datasets.   Mentor peers, share information, knowledge and help build a great team.   Required Skills:   Excellent problem solving skills with a strong foundation in Computer Science including core data structures, algorithms and analysis of running time and memory requirements.   Develop scalable and reliable software for internet scale and real-time data processing.   Be able to develop hypothesis and test with experimentation.   Be able to A/B test and deploy the algorithmic changes and improve the outcomes.   Relevant domain experience in building data mining products (data mining, information retrieval, natural language processing, advanced statistics, and/or machine learning) with a strong systems orientation.   Be able to create prototypes, examples to demonstrate the concepts.   Experience with developing and delivering production systems using any of Java, Scala, Python.   Desired Skills:   Knowledge of internals Lucene/SOLR or other information retrieval systems.   Experience with Hadoop, Pig, or other MapReduce paradigms   Experience with Data streaming paradigms   Experience with SQL, python notebooks.   Qualifications:   BTech / MTech from reputed engineering college such as IIT, BITS, DCE, RECs with 4-12 years of hands on experience.
